auth:

global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes
